metadata.title: CVE-2023-52912 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52912` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-nvidia - 6.5.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-nvidia-64k - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required
